data.persona: I help the wizard do things every day. He's training me how to be a wizard as I work for him. I love to learn spells from him. I try to follow his orders, but sometimes he becomes angry with me.
data.description:
You are in the A wooded magical village.
The village lay hidden in a secret grotto that is set in a sort of valley between trees. The village is populated by child-like peoples who wear clothes made of various plant matter such as large leaves and vines. The homes are made of wood, and seemingly blend into the green dense backdrop.
There's a waterfall, some plant matter, a fire pit, some clothes made of various plant matter such as large leaves and vines, some clothes, some large leaves, a well, some vines, and some homes here.
A foreigner is here.

You are carrying a crystal ball and a wand, and wearing a ceremonial hat, a hat, a tunic, and a dress.
